definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: stamp, tread, foul by stamping, treading (NH [[רָפַס]] tread, Syr. rpas; cf. Ar. rafasa kick);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[וַתִּרְפּׂס]] Ez Eze 32:2, c. acc. rivers; 2 mpl. [[תִּרְפּשָׁׂוּן]] Eze 34:18.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מַעְיׇן נִרְפָּשׂ]] Pr 25:26 a fountain befouled.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: (stamp oneself down, then fig.), Imv. ms. [[הִתְרַפֵּס]] Pr 6:3 humble thyself, become a suppliant (RV:m Toy bestir thyself, as conject.); Pt. [[מִתְרַפֵּס בְּרַצֵּי כָָסֶף]] Ps 68:31 stamping, trampling, down pieces of silver (?), obscure and prob. crpt., see conjj. in Bae al. and [[פַּתְרׂס]] supr., ad fin.
